title: In-Laws and Staying Committed
itunes:author: Guest: Melanie Shankle
itunes:summary:
There's an old saying about marriage, "you don't just marry your spouse, you marry the person's family." If we're honest, sometimes learning to get along with in-laws is a big adjustment. John, Erin and Greg share about staying committed while trying to get along with your spouse's family. Featuring Melanie Shankle.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Melanie Shankle's book "The Antelope in the Living Room: The Real Story of Two People Sharing One Life" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-11-16?refcd=1286104

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/in-laws-and-staying-committed/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
